bool DRMPlugin::IXMLElement::GetBoolValue (   )  [inline]
 

Get element value as boolean.

If string representation of the element value is neither true nor false, it will fail.

Returns:
Element value. If fails, throws XMLException.

virtual IXMLElement* DRMPlugin::IXMLElement::GetChildElement (  const std::string &  path  )  [pure virtual]
 

Get child element with given path.

Path elements' names must be divided by a dot ("."). If path is an empty string (""), returns this element.
